summary: Documentation for CSV file used for importing and exporting teams. Note that the order of team creation must ensure, any team referenced in a row (as parent team) must already exist or created in earlier rows in the CSV file.

headers.name: name
headers.description: The name of the team being created.

headers.name: description
headers.description: Description for the team in markdown format.
examples: `Data Team` is responsible for creating curated data assets.

headers.name: teamType
examples: When set to empty `""`, the default value is `Group`

headers.name: parents
headers.description: The parent teams to which this team being created belongs to.
examples: `Engineering Team` could be parent of `Data Team`

headers.name: Owner
headers.description: Name of the user that is owner/administrator/manager of this team.

headers.name: isJoinable
headers.description: When true, team is open for any user to join. Default value is `true`.
examples: When set to empty `""`, the default value is `false`.

headers.name: defaultRoles
headers.description: Roles that are inherited by all the member users of the team. Multiple roles are separated by ';'.

headers.name: policies
headers.description: List of policies at the team level that applies to all it's members.
